00:00:06.900 - 00:00:21.300: good morning everybody it's my pleasure to join Thomas in welcoming you to the Federal Reserve for its conference on monetary policy implementation and transmission in the post-crisis.

00:00:22.200 - 00:00:58.100: The conference aims to bring together academics and Central Bank Economist Financial Market practitioners and policy-makers to stimulate debate and research on the topics it's critically important to the federal reserve's mission for conducting monetary policy in the pursuit of Maximum employment and stable prices the global financial crisis had profound effects on our economy and it altered the way many think about monetary policy at the peak of the crisis and during its immediate aftermath
